data.name: VRflow B737NG
data.description:
- This is the individual/student version of VRflow -

VRflow B737NG is the interactive cockpit procedure trainer for pilots. Train procedures in training scenarios that incorporate detailed aircraft behavior including sounds, instruments and cockpit layout.

VRflow incorporates numerous features for efficient learning and aircraft familiarization, ideal for type ratings. Train with or without visual help, track your errors, see your training time, train with an automatic crewmember and much more.

14 normal procedures and 3 emergency/abonormal procedures are included with dynamic checklists, step by step explanations and task sharing with the automatic crew member.

VRflow also contains Explore Mode, where you can explore the cockpit and learn about systems.

The individual/student version does not include multi-crew functionality.

changelog.change_log: Overall improvements and minor procedure adjustments. VR tutorial added.
Performance improvements and minor bug fixes.
Guide arrow added to help you learn the flows faster. Improved systems behavior. Climb, Cruise and Descent procedures added. The Automatic Crewmember will perform callouts verbally. Minor bug fixes.
Improved Wrist Menu and help features. Minor improvements to procedures and overall stability improved.
Updated description, minor bug fixes and procedure improvements.
Updates: Emergency procedures, Adjustable speed on AI crewmember, new instruction video and general bug fixes
